name: Rassan Tarabein
text:
THIS IS THE MOST DESPICABLE SCAMMERS I EVER SAW IN MY LIFE !
We bought new Buick Encore from Chris Meyer in 2018 (now Tamron Buick Daphne). Yesterday it didn’t start, and we had it towed a guy from Tamron Buick service department (named Shay) called and claimed that the issue was a dead battery ask him for an authorization to replace it for $165 plus tax. It was stunning to hear this as the battery was replaced just last month from O'Reilly auto, who kindly accepted to replace the battery. Shay called back upset asking to authorize $50 charge to “spray the brand-new battery with sealant” to prevent it from corrosion and breaking down again. miss Becky at O'Reilly auto called and told me that Shay was a liar as she tested the old battery (which Shay claimed to be broker and wanted to replace). Shay ended up charging the amount of the battery anyhow.
Shay seems to be trained to scam as his boss, Kyle shamelessly stood by the scam and endorsed it.

name: Queen Lewis
text: I took my car in today needingServiceI was denied service being that another dealer  putting a battery in my car so they Responded  IT  couldn't be looked at it even after me telling disclosing I purchased my car from there, so I'm stuck not knowing What's going on with my car not to mention its a hybrid. It's very hard to find someone to check it VERY RUDE AND UNPROFESSIONAL SERVICE MAN!!  No customer service whatsoever  I WILL DEFINITELY TELL MY FAMILY AND FRIENDS TO NOT DO BUSINESS THERE ...SIGNED A DISGUSTED customer

name: Margie Cochran
text:
It was the most rewarding car purchase we have ever experienced. Absolutely no pressure and the fastest car purchase also.  Antonio the finance manager was friendly made our signing was a great experience.  He explained everything you would have thought some had given you your car the experience was absolutely fantastic.  Our salesperson was the best
Alyssa Penne she never once pressured us.  Alyssa made sure we knew where the restrooms and their free cold water bottles was located.  The transition with Alyssa was very enjoyable.  Alyssa made you so comfortable you would thought she was your sister or best friend
Alyssa greeted us with a huge smile ( so genuine).  Alyssa is a hometown girl and after you meet her and leave a little piece of her heart , kindness, and warmth stays with your soul. We will tell everyone to go to. CHRIS MYERS in Daphne and ask for Alyssa and you will leave with the car you want with NO STRESS.  When you leave with your car it will hit you and you will tell yourself we got the car we wanted and did not leave CHRIS MYERS stressed BUT relaxed and you will tell yourself that was the best calming experience we have ever had. SO GO TO CHRIS MYERS AND ASK FOR ALYSSA and she will do the rest.  Oh yeah one more thing she loves her GRANDPA. Her heart and soul shines through at the thought of her GRANDPA.❤❤  Margie and Larry Cochran.  Head to CHRIS MYERS in Daphne see Alyssa.

name: Stephani Brock
text: Absolutely pleased and just fantastic experience Brian Hanson is a great non pressure salesman.

name: R1900
text: Most of the 5 stars are from family and friends. Go look up youtube videos on CHRIS MYERS BUICK GMC. Just saw a video where Bryant, or whatever the manager/salespersons name is, threatened the customer how he will not make it home. Watch out for Tony Soprano there, fellas!

name: Mike & Kathy Estes
text: Good place to look for a car or truck ,work's real hard to put you in a car.

name: Steven Shelp
text: Deleted my review... great business practices......now you’re really sharing your true colors

name: Tami Harris
text:
I am a repeat client with Chris Myers.
Always happy the way the buying process is handled.
And feel appreciated for being a customer

name: Dakota Clevenger
text: I cannot thank Chris Myers Service department enough for their professionalism.  Kyle and Shay did an outstanding job!  I will always use the service department at Chris Myers Automall.

name: Elizabeth Anne Sclater
text:
I question the ethics of this company regarding their service department operations. Their web site lists a certain price for one of the routine maintenances ... only as I was dropping off my keys was I told that “oh, the web site is wrong, there are other things we do at that mileage ...” and the final bill was more than double what the web site indicates.

I have no reason to believe that the *quality* of the work is lacking, but that change-up between web price and final invoice leaves me terribly skeptical. At best it’s a lack of attention to honest detail in their advertising; at worst, a blatant bait/switch. Friendly people, but I do not trust them.

name: Hornaday quickfire
text: I've always had good customer service here.

name: Jesse Hoffmann
text: Total scam of a dealership. If you don't believe it, you'll see for yourself. *Don't buy here*

name: Teresa McCardle
text: This is an awesome dealership with outstanding customer service!!

name: Mr. B D
text: I cannot speak on the dealership itself as this is for the service department. They took care of a problem that my local dealership refused to acknowledge existed. Under warranty. I will recommend their services.

name: Ben Cason
text: Great place to buy a car

name: Forrest Corzealious
text: I had a pleasant experience. The staff was very courteous and professional! I purchased my vehicle from Brooks Motor. All of my visits has been encouraging. First 2 oil changes were free. The assistance were great in helping me get an Auto Pass card. I look forward to service rendered. BUY IT AT BROOKS!!

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback, Forrest. We strive to provide excellent service to our customers at Brooks Motors and look forward to again provide excellent service the next time you visit us!

name: billodmbellsouth
text: I was greeted immediately when I drove up and got out to look at trucks. Friendly, informative, NICE sales person. Pleasant experience from A to Z! Everything was done the way I think it should be done as far as the whole vehicle purchase experience. If I had to purchase another vehicle (I've been a Chevy man for 50 years!) I would definitely look here first.

name: Kathy Mccutcheon
text: Just bought a new Buick Encore, absolutely love it! My experience buying this car was wonderful and very stress free! Ron Scogin was my sales rep and he was very professional and friendly! His instructions on operating the car before I left the car lot were extremely helpful! Everyone at this dealership was friendly and helpful! First time in many years that buying a car was so easy and stress free! Nice to know I didn't have to spend an entire day going through this process! Love my car and service!!😊

name: Ursurla Barnes
text: I love the fact you can go look around on the lot and not be chased down by a salesperson. When you are ready to test drive you will make an instant friend with the salesperson...very friendly and in-depth knowledge of the cars. I did not leave the Brooks lot with my new car without knowing how everything worked ! Last, but the main reason I purchased again from Brooks was the service department. I am going to describe it as I told them..WOW !! Yes, it is that good.  😊

name: Damesia Crocker
text: Everyone here at Brooks was an absolute delight to work with. They made our purchase  very easy and helped us get into exactly what we were looking for. Thanks to all the staff there for being such a great team to do business with.

resp.text: Damesia, congratulations on your new vehicle purchase, and thank you for your recommendation of our team! We sincerely thank you for your business and hope to continue serving you for many years to come.

name: Big EL
text: Great staff & service!! Friendly & knowledgeable. Beautiful facilities. Service shop is top notch. Tons of vehicles on the lot!!!

name: Chris Owes
text: Joseph Deshler, Preston Brooks, Paula Mashburn and Shawn Minter have all been exceptional throughout the purchase process of my first vehicle as well as during my first service inspection. I would recommend them all to anyone. They listened to me and made sure I got what best fit me although I did not initially know what I wanted. Shawn Minter carried out my first maintenance inspection and explained everything to me in detail although there were no issues I felt comfortable after his thorough explanation.

name: Wanda Etheridge
text: Always willing to help you out.Even made fresh coffee for me after finding out just worked off nights. Great service Rep. Shawn Minter

resp.text: Thank you Wanda for your kind words & Thank you for choosing Brooks! We understand those long hours........

name: Christopher Owes
text: The service at Brooks Motors is fantastic!! Everyone is very professional and helpful. I enjoy each visit to the dealership.

name: Richard Grant
text: Had issue with a 2012 Acadia  we purchased there since day one. many trips in for repair  still present after 5 years. Service rework is frustrating and time consuming. Ownership does not seem to care about customers, I/13/17 service on my 2013 Sierra HD diesel ended any relationship with this dealership. Have owned GM products for 45 years and this is by far the worst dealership  i have worked with. They have some good people but leadership is wanting.

resp.text: Hi Richard, we appreciate you taking the time to respond. The staff at Brooks Motors take our reviews very seriously. Please call Preston Brooks (Business Manager), (334) 636-5485 for ways we can work towards resolving these issues. We look forward to hearing from you soon.

name: Nancy R
text:
I had an oil change done on my Volkswagen.  the staff was very friendly from the time I came through the door.  I really liked that when I pulled up to the Service lane they opened the door and I was able to drive in, then the waiting room was just inside the door.
I will be back for my next service.

name: Scott Myers
text: Great service from Keith and Brooks Service Department that day! Got me in and out quickly!

name: Robin Ogden
text: I had a great experience at Brooks Motor service department they were kind and very friendly also everything was done in a timely manner

name: Richard Brewton
text:
I looked for over a month for the SIERRA I wanted. I had received several emails from Brooks but because of the distance from home I avoided making the drive.  After a frustrating Saturday talking to other dealers, I told my wife Rae I was driving to Thomasville Monday to see what they had.  Rae suggested we make the drive that afternoon.

I never expected to be driving a new SIERRA home that afternoon.

We arrived at Brooks late on Saturday afternoon.  I walked on the lot and found the Sierra I had wanted all along.  Neil was very helpful with the test drive and answering our question.

I had done a lot of research on USAA's car buying site and TrueCar's site as will.  When Neil presented Brooks pricing, it was well within the range  I expected to pay.  The financing was in line with the research I had done as well.

Neil, Kelly and Preston were very gracious staying after hours to complete our transaction.

Rae and I agreed this was the best experience either of us had ever experienced when purchasing a new vehicle. Relaxed, no anxiety and we left totally satisfied with every aspect of the transaction.

Thank you to all!!

PS: THE COOKIES WERE FABULOUS !!!!

resp.text: We're happy to hear that you found our staff so helpful, Richard! We sincerely appreciate your business and kind review. We hope to see you again in the future! Safe travels!

name: William Odom
text: I would like to invite anyone and everyone that is wanting to buy a new or used vehicle you should go to Brooks Chevrolet and Thomasville Alabama I promise you that you won't have that feeling of being harassed or pressured ... These guys are awesome !!

name: Erin Andrews
text:
Came to the dealership explaining my vehicle is randomly stalling out. Which is extremely dangerous. If I stalled out in a busy intersection, red light, or train tracks, I could die. And this is the car I carry my 2 babies in. I've worked in the service department industry for years and years before I had my kids and from my knowledge it's a liability to turn away a customer if their car is doing anything that could put you in danger. Well, this dealership did.

That's okay though. I'll call a lawyer if anything happens to me or my family. I'm headed to Chris Myers GMC.

name: Roland Hutchinson
text: Great help in choosing my truck and explaining it's operation and setting up the options.

name: Vater Butler
text: I was very pleased with the way that the service department treated me when I was there.

name: Wiley Blankenship
text: Awesome service! Bought a truck  and process could not have been better! I 'll be back.

name: Princess Butler
text: Great experience, very time efficient.  Price wasn't bad either!

name: Dot Trotter
text: Everyone involved with my dealings while at Brooks Motors were very nice and professional.

name: BERTHA JONES
text: The Best Hands To Leave Your Car Into.

name: Debra Tyler
text: These people are prompt and reasonable

name: Carolyn “Carol Kappa” Wilson
text: Very friendly, helpful atmosphere in service department.

name: SAMURAI GAMING Youtube
text: The staff are friendly and helpful.We would buy from Brooks again.

resp.text: We are more than glad to be of service, Christina. If you need more help, our team is available to talk  safe travels!

name: Felix David Fuller
text: Personnel are like "family".  Courteous and dependable.

name: Sarah Anderson
text: Extreamly satisfied with our buying experience!

name: Randy Krout
text: Great people and great service very happy

name: marquis hattaway
text: The people was nice and very friendly

name: Richard Daniel
text: Doc's is a great dealer.

name: Bonnie Gibson
text: Excellent treatment excellent service.

name: TINA NORDAN
text: Excellent! 100% Satisfied Customer!

name: DeCarlos Tubbs
text: Great customer service..

name: Bud Riviere
text: Very competent, thorough and courteous.

name: Clay Baugh
text: Great, very pleased with the service.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Clay. Feel free to stop by if you ever need any more help.

name: Dave Gahlinger
text: Great place to purchase a car

name: Tommie Bouler
text: Poor service center unqualified mechanics

resp.text:
Im sorry to hear this Tommy as we have well qualified GM certified mechanics. Can you please elaborate on the issues that you encountered?

Thanks.

name: Elizabeth Kennedy
text: Very Good Experience.

name: Bill Gunnels
text: satisfied

name: Joshua Andrews
text: love it

name: Angela Bailey
text: Excellent services, professional, courteous people, no long waiting for services to be done, affordable.. annndddd the most comfortable chair's ( that will put you asleep) in the waiting room, with Westerns showing on TV

name: Robin Tyra
text: Highly recommend using Billy Lawrence dealer and service department. Top notch

name: Colleen Murphy
text: We've used their service department for years. Today we bought a new Buick from them. Think we got a good deal and expect to take it there for service. We've always been satisfied with all our dealings there.

name: Elaine Prather
text: Talked to a very nice salesman, was just looking for info

name: Thomas Ivery
text: Had good experience there very helpful 👍

name: William George
text: Great experience and the staff was so helpful. We would definitely buy from them again. We would recommend to anyone.

name: Autumn Blalock
text: Always willing to go the extra mile or stay a little late to help a customer! 100% recommend!

name: Bobby Wolfe
text: The customer appreciation that Billy Lawrence Buick GMC salesmen have is unmatched, When I move to California, I will still buy my trucks from Billy.

name: Jerry Corbin
text: They greatest!  Awesome service.  They fixed a problem another dealership caused!

name: Gary White
text: Always great dealing with Billy and Scott Lawrence.

name: Pamela Ellison
text: Very friendly.... The work on my SUV was done very well..... The inside of my SUV had know signs of grease which was great.....

name: Jennifer Holloway
text: Great people no hassle no pressure

name: Chad Hughes
text: Great people that will take care of you!

name: Irene Bruce
text: Not good if you do not have good credit and lots of 💰  don't waste your time

name: jean senecal
text: Great service good selection personable service

name: carolyn gleaton
text: those are GREAT FOLKS.......

name: Trey Anderson
text: Small Town dealer with Big Time Service

name: Zack Burdeshaw
text: Great place to buy a vehicle!

name: Jonathan Taylor
text: Great service dept.

name: King Washington
text: Great ace

name: Brandy Peterson
text: These people were totally awesome.and they a family business. Could not have ask for better people to do business with. And if you need a car this is the place to go... Make sure you ask for Blake. He is there son and such a fine young gentleman. He even followed us to our car and open the doors. Very down to earth and respectful people!! I will definitely do more business with them and everyone else should also. I promise u will not be disappointed!

name: Jimmy Johnson
text: Awesome place, very friendly car salesman who aren't pushy, great deals on car. Owner is really willing to work with you and make sure the deal goes through. I got my car at a great price and it was a great car. Joel even helped me when I had issues. Will definitely shop there again.

name: Anthony Parker
text: These are the best people you'll ever meet. Very helpful and full of knowledge about the vehicle. But the thing I like most is the dedication to honesty. Don't find that much nowadays. Awesome crew. Especially LUKE PARKER.

name: Luke Parker
text: Good people. Haven't bought anything from here but I know people who have and my friend works there. I do know they offer warranties which is a plus to me, especially when buying a used car. I would recommend them if your looking for a used car.

name: DodgeCummings 04
text: I have done business with Joel Nuss, who is now the full owner of this dealership. It has been an excellent experience. I, being in the same business as he, know without a doubt he is striving to sell great vehicles and do a good business with people. He wants to make his customers happy. We have had behind the scene conversations about this. You can have full confidence in knowing this place will live up to their end of the deal. They tell what they know about the vehicles. They cannot predict the future of how a vehicle performs, but they try to sell good ones and make people happy.

name: Toni Smith
text: Couldn't be happier with our purchase. Always friendly staff and very helpful. Joel goes above and beyond to make sure he has 100% customer satisfaction. I would suggest buying from them for your next purchase!!

name: James Wright
text: I've had great experiences with these guys. They will always get my business.Salesman Blake Barrett helped me find the perfect truck for hauling and Hunting.I was about to leave the lot with my new truck and the owner Joel Nuss ran out to thank me and he filled my tank up and bought my family dinner for that night.Such a nice family atmosphere here.I will return and I will send my friends to these guys.Also,THANK YOU FOR SPONSORSHIP FOR THE GOOD HOPE HIGH SCHOOL FISHING TEAM.!!!

name: Coins, Dreams & Crazy Things
text: What an amazing team! As a female shopper I know we can sometimes feel intimidated, or even a bit uncomfortable while car shopping. This was not my experience at all at NAW. These gentlemen were informative, honest and most of all respectful. They worked with me for several days with several vehicles until I found the perfect one for my family and I. They are quick to respond to messages, and have truly gone above and beyond what a car dealership normally would. You can trust these guys to get a great vehicle at a fair price, and most of all customer service that doesn't even compare to others in this industry. Trust Joel, Diane, Luke, Blake , Junior and Tommy! It's amazing how I've been treated by these folks!

name: Jason Clark
text: I drove 4 hours there to go purchase a truck. I asked if anything was wrong with the truck and they assured me there was not a thing wrong with the truck and there’s no dents/scratches in truck. When I get there I see there are scratches and dents. The truck had various amounts of minor problems and head aches. The only reason I bought it was because I had already drove 4 hours. I would not consider this a trust worthy business. “Excellent vehicle all the way around” was the biggest lie I’ve heard..  Enjoying the truck so far because the variety of issues.

name: Cody45551
text: I have been dealing with these guys at North Alabama Wholesale autos for over 10 years now. I have to say they will do things that most car dealers wont. I have never had an issue with buying a vehicle from them. Just good people with big hearts!!! Thanks for all u have done!!

name: Christian Simmons
text: Thank you Guys for the great deal on my ram 3500.I called these guys last week and was coming from Atlanta to buy this truck.I sent in a deposit to hold it and when I finally got there the truck was Detailed full of fuel.Joel Nuss also took care of my motel room and dinner here because it was late and I had worked all day before coming up.Joel and Diane Nuss do a great job here and make you feel at home. Has to be the best experience I’ve ever had buying a truck.You guys go above and beyond.There son Blake took care of me as well.Thanks again guys and I will be sending ALL of my friends your way!

name: Terry Reeves
text: Just bought a 2004 GMC Sierra at a great price! The staff was very friendly and family oriented. I would definitely buy from them again I highly recommend North Alabama Wholesale.

name: Stacy Clark
text:
Offered to buy truck and send nonrefundable deposit and got the runaround.

I've bought multiple vehicles from out of state and a $500 deposit tends to get cooperation  from more reputable dealers.

I then offered to have my bank wire the funds or overnight the check and they wouldn't go for that; keep in mind this was Dec 23rd so getting my credit union to fund same day without wiring instructions for an out of state transaction would not be possible.

Was offered the truck if I could get there, 4 hours away, with full cash payment.

Later that day they raised the price 10%, sounds like the owner messed up on his pricing and wanted to find any way to not honor the price he initially offered me.

After reading these other reviews I think it was for the better.

name: Julie Gay
text:
I recently purchased a Tahoe from North Alabama Wholesale. The salesman was very helpful and nice with the process. I would recommend my friends/family members to purchase a vehicle from them. Joel Nuss and his staff tries to make sure each customer leaves happy with their purchase..
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

name: J&M Custom Crafts
text: They had a great selection of vehicles and I found the perfect truck! Excellent service, and no complaints at all! I would definitely go there again!

name: Mike Ashbaugh
text: Joel! Thanks for my deal! I really enjoy my new Mini Cooper! I got a good deal and it was seamlessly easy to do business with you! That's why I am a return customer!

name: DANIEL LIGHT
text: Purchased 3 different vehicles from them and all 3 had problems but I just fixed the problems..well I thought they would return the favor by helping me out by trying to get out of a truck payment that I purchased from another dealer (the truck was in excellent condition with very low miles BTW)I went in and the old man was sitting looking on his phone basically ignoring me while I was telling him my situation and he didn't even bother to come out and look at it,he just said if it wasn't 4x4 he wasn't interested.. What a jerk!!..and they really do sell junk 9 times out of 10

name: Tyler Letson
text: Bought Durango as is no warranty and tore up down the road but give us loaner car until ours was fixed and later give us a different vehicle that they did not have to do. Anywhere else would not help as much as they did! Very nice and understanding staff.

name: Daniel Perry
text: Wanna say thanks to everyone at North Alabama Wholesale for helping me in every way possible I've bought 2 trucks in the last 4 months and they went above and beyond to work with me. Super nice people recommend anyone who is looking for a vehicle these are the folks you need to see!!

name: Luke Costello
text: I bought a truck from this dealership and got totally scammed. I bought it from another state and trusted the dealership to be honest and trustworthy and did not receive that. I specifically asked the salesman if there was any rust underneath because i know this years truck is prone to that and he told me no and that it was all clean. I had it shipped to me and when it got here it was COVERED with rust underneath and was even missing parts of the body due to being eaten up by rust. I did not even get the truck of the transport truck and told them to ship it back. I had to eat the shipping costs for going there and back. I have now contacted the dealership and told them I want my money returned. This dealership was a total lie and deceitful transaction.

name: Patty Douthit
text: Loving my Nissan Altima that I purchased from these guys. The family environment was top notch. Will definitely send my friends to buy there vehicles there. The owner Joel Nuss had my car filled up and threw in a warranty on the house!!  Customer service was fantastic

name: Reagan Short
text: One of the workers there, Luke Parker, was extremely helpful to me! I highly recommend that anybody use North Alabama Wholesale. You will be very pleased!

name: Clay Messer
text: I only had about a five minute conversation with the sales guy/owner/worker.  I asked him to send me a few more pictures of the vehicle and he acted like it was too much trouble.  I live about 3 hours away from this dealership and just wanted to see a few more pictures before I drove three hours just to look under the hood of a truck.  I can certainly understand that he gets a lot of "tire kickers" in his business, but I run a small business as well.  I treat every customer with the same amount of respect whether they are purchasing from me or not.  If everything checked out okay, I would have given him cash for the full amount just as soon as I could get up there.  Now, I feel that he doesn't deserve any business whatsoever.  That's just my opinion.

name: Jim Nix
text: Joel and his Staff were the Friendliest and Curtious. Joel helped me get the right truck in my budget. Highly recommend these Fine people to anyone. Will do business again. Thanks

name: Brenda Shermon
text: I've bought more than one vehicle from them. My daughter and I both bought our vehicles from Joel. He was nice and informative every step of the way. Their pricing compared to other dealerships is incomparable.

name: Emily Vincent
text: This is a great place to do business, the atmosphere is great, they are a great family to do business with! Their financing is top of the notch, they have a great selection of vehicles, and I highly recommend them if you are looking for a vehicle!

name: Steve Patrick
text: Great selection, friendly and honest sales people. The staff was very professional and helpful! Highly recommend.

name: Amy Cleghorn
text: These guys are awesome.   They have great salesman and very good vehicles and service.   We are working on our 10th one.   Come on down and check them out.   Ask for Blake.

name: Devon Green
text: Had a great experience dealing with these guys.They are no pressure and the atmosphere was great.They even filled my tank and gave me 6 months warranty.Will defiantly refer them to all of my friends.I got a finance rate of %2.69 for 60 months and ZERO down.Thanks again to Joel and Diane Nuss and there great staff

name: Anthony Harlan
text: Had a great experience with these guys.Blake Barrett did an awesome job.We are very happy with our purchase and will be sending all my friends here.Diane did a great job getting us financed.

name: Brandi Bradford
text: Bought multiple vehicles from them and i loved them will never go anywhere else!! Smooth transactions and super nice!! thanks owner Joel Nuss for helping me find my vehicles!!!

name: Haley Moore
text: Wonderful place. Hard working, wonderful people. Would definitely recommend people to come here.

name: Diane Nuss
text: ABSOLUTLEY a great DEALERSHIP.Thank you for the fantastic deal on my Toyota Tundra!!! I will send ALL of my friends and family here.Highly recomended!!!! You guys made it very easy.

name: Blake Barrett
text: This place is not what people say it is!! I have bought two trucks and have not had a problem at all.. The staff is great and couldn't be more helpful in putting me in a good truck!!!

name: Stone Cold_98
text: Great people they are very friendly. Do everything in the power to help you great place

name: Johnny Jarrett
text: I had an excellent experience with north Alabama wholesale! They have a great variety of cars, trucks, and suv's, and they were at good prices!

name: James Garmon
text: Wonderful service all employees were very upbeat happy helpful friendly made feel welcome. Have bout several vehicles over the years all were wonderful vehicles

name: Stephanie Morton
text: Joel Nuss is a great business owner. Friendly, dependable and trustworthy. He wont do you wrong.

name: Cj Mooney
text: I've bought 10 trucks here over the last 20 years.These guys are great and have a fantastic business.Joel Diane Nuss and there  staff have done a great job.We will send customers there anytime we hear of them needing a car.

name: Judy Moore
text: Bought our truck from there. Great service and a wonderful family business. They really take the time to help you. I would highly suggest anyone to go here for a car, truck, or SUV.

name: steven frost
text: Very caring people made me feel like I was at my house would recommend anyone to come here for a car

name: Bobby Cleghorn
text: Been a customer for several years.  We decided we needed more room. They didn't have the vehicle we were looking for. Told the salesman our needs, he said no problem I'll call you tomorrow.  They had the car we wanted the next day. Couldn't be happier with the service or staff.

name: Victoria Mendoza
text: Best dealers I have ever dealt with very honest and loyal people will never will but cars from anyone else....Great people love this place

name: Rebecca Cowan
text: This is the second car that my husband end I have bought here and they have made it as easy and painless as car buying can be .

name: Daquari Bishop
text: Absolutely a great dealership.Owner Carl Nuss and his staff are doing a great job.We love our Tahoe that we purchased.They made everything easy and fast.The customer service couldn't be better.We will send all of our friends and family there to see these guys.Thank y'all again!!! Updated. Done business there for over 20 years and they always kept their word. I don't know if it's a change in ownership or what but that has changed. A month ago there was a vehicle I was very interested in. A week went by and it was still there so I went in with my husband and talked to Joel about it. He said ownership was changing and his dad was going to be leaving and to give him a couple weeks and he would give us an awesome deal on it which was fine because we needed to sell our vehicle to purchase that one. After 2 weeks we had a buyer for ours and was told to call the following week and set up time to do the deal on the vehicle I wanted so bad. Well I called 2 days ago and left message for him and told them it was about the blazer, she said ok he will call you back. Never heard anything. My husband calls up there today and he isn't in so my husband asked if blazer was still there. Guy says no we sold it back last week.😡 Well good damn thing we told guy that was buying ours that we couldn't do deal until the day we was able to get other one. I understand someone could have came and offered more than we was buying it for but Atleast he could have had the decency to call and let us know.

name: Daniel Brock
text: Had a great experience at this dealership,thank you Tommy Jones for helping me.Loving my Dodge truck.I will definitely send my friends to see you.The hospitality is great

name: breanna couch
text: BUYER BEWARE. AWFUL BUISNESS. Worst experience trying to buy a car I have EVER had. Had already been to the bank and gotten our loan, got on the phone with them to let them know we were getting the check later that day and coming to get the vehicle, because they told us once we let them know we were approved and coming to get it they would pull it off the lot, lock it up and pull the stickers off but they did nothing but hassle us and rush us and tell us they were running it through the auction that same day then right after let us know that "someone just came in with cash in hand and sold it." DURING THE SAME PHONE CALL, how ironic. My fiancé is on second shift so we were trying to do it as soon as we were able and had time but that wasn't good enough for them. Awful customer service, awful business.

name: Mansel Freeman
text: I looked all over the south trying to find the Ford F450 that I needed for my farm.Had several dealerships tell me that they would call me when they located this truck.These guys are great and did exactly what they said they would do.Owner Joel Nuss went to work fast and located my truck for me,he also flew to Texas and picked it up for me and drove it back to Alabama.When it got to cullman he had it serviced and filled up with fuel.I appreciate the effort from him and his crew.Thank you so much.Love my truck

name: Taylor King
text: The staff was very friendly and ready to help. Best experience that I have ever had in looking for a car.

name: kewi wolf
text: Love my Toyota!! Thank you Diane Joel And Blake for fitting exactly what i needed.Lookingforward to many years of dealing with you guys.Thank you

name: Alpha Nutrition
text: Had a great experience with these guys.Joel Nuss and his staff do a great job.We love our vehicle and recommend anyone go there.Our family will continue to purchase our vehicles from this dealership!!

name: Preston Griffin
text: Went to buy a truck from lot and the one I looked at online was not what I wanted. Joel went out of his way to find one that I wanted. When I buy again I will for sure go back to see them.

name: Mel Cowan
text: Bought my last two luxury cars from NAWA. I could not be more please with the friendly manner that was given and also with the fair price they offered for the car I was buying and my trade in. I would definitely use them again!

name: Preston Calvert
text: Great place and great people. They have a great selection of vehicles as well and great prices.

name: Hayden Smith
text: It's a great place. They salesman was nice and helped me find a truck

name: Anna Marie
text:
I bought a boat they were selling for family.

It was a piece of crap. I feel what you sell reflects back on you!! I wouldn't buy anything from them.

name: Dylan Jones
text: I bought a truck from them 5 years ago and it's still going strong! They are good people!

name: Nicholas Monfort
text: We bought a 2005 ford Expedition from Joel Nuss. He gave us a great deal and the customer service was great.

name: Stephanie Hill
text: Horrible! Never buy anything from them. The Yukon we got was a piece of trash. The AC went out 2 days after we bought it and thats just one problem! They pretty much robbed us!

name: Ethan Mullet
text: Had a great experience buying my truck from these guys.They did not pressure me but helped me find exactly what i needed for pulling my trailer.Owner Joel Nuss went above and beyond to help me.Blake Barrett was my salesman and he filled up my truck with deisel fuel and washed it and dryed it for me.The family environment is great here.They treat you like family.I will be back again one day and will send my friends to see these guys.Thanks again.

name: Nick Kelley
text:
Be very careful buying a used vehicle.
Be even more careful and avoid these guys.

name: kassi ingram
text: Great service and nice friendly people even gave me a full tank of gas

name: Nerdy Fred
text: Love our new tahoe.Thank you for all your help. We will always do our buisness here

name: Elton Jones
text: Been looking for a good truck to hunt with and still be a nice truck for Sunday church.I called these guys and they showed me everything they had and also the trucks they had coming in.I really appreciate them taking time for me  and treated me like family.Im loving my truck.Thanks to the owner Joel Nuss and his staff.Diane Nuss got me a great interest rate on my financing with the credit union.Yall are great.Thanks again!! See you soon

name: Charles Harbison
text: Had a wonderful experience purchasing my truck from these guys.They as always came thru for me.Owner JOEL NUSS had new tires put on my truck and also thru in a warranty.Havent had any issues with my truck and very happy.My family has been buying from this dealership for years and will continue

name: Tommy Jones
text: We bought a Dodge Ram truck from North Alabama Wholesale Auto. Great salesman and easy to deal with.

name: daniel ortega
text: Great place to purchase with a great selection and variety of trucks and cars! No matter your financial situation Joel Nuss will do whatever he can to assist you in anyway possible!

name: AXC “Mixed” MartialArts
text: Awesome service and great vehicle to choose from. I would definitely recommend them to my friends and family to buy their vehicles.

name: Alyssa Harlan
text: Super duper nice lady that works as the office manager. Loved buying from these guys!

name: Wayne Glover
text: This place is such a great place to get your car or truck. They'll work with you to get one also to keep one.

name: Kayla Alexander
text: I traded in a vehicle 2 months ago and they still have not satisfied the lien on the vehicle I traded in. Now I have my financial instituiton calling me because I have another payment due. I am still trying to get this taken care of with them, and now they are saying there was a hiccupp!!! DO NOT DO BUSINESS WITH THESE PEOPLE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Lisa Hale
text: Awesome experience on the purchasing a F350 King Ranch! Thanks Joel!!

name: B E
text: Don't buy anything from this place! Run as fast as you can from them! They lie to you, and are very rude!

name: rpgproto
text: Great servicw and attitude from tommy

name: Perry Casey
text: Wish they had a negative stars scale/grade. DO NOT BUY FROM THESE PEOPLE! SCAMMERS!!!!!!! CROOKS!!!!!!! LIARS!!!!!!!

name: Latisha Buzbee
text: This was an outstanding car lot!

name: Ivy Kilcollins
text: Terrible. Crooks. Sell you anything and take your money.

name: Jacob Beard
text: They do anything they can to fit your needs

name: Melissa Markham
text: Come to find out these guys are a joke we had our van a year an by time we got it home we had problems with the electrical system the car was screwed worst place to get a vehicle they wouldn't even help us an we had just got it!

name: Kboozie
text: Tommy was great

name: Tj Parker
text: Wow the lowest rating in Cullman

name: Brenton Trice
text: Good

name: Alicia Alldredge
text: RUN!!! RUN FAR AWAY!!!
